title: How Andreas Leknessund went from Arctic Race volunteer to one of Norway’s top Tour de France hopes
content:
After nearly a week in the pink jersey at the Giro d'Italia, there is expectation for more success with big move to Uno-X.

Read the full article at How Andreas Leknessund went from Arctic Race volunteer to one of Norway’s top Tour de France hopes on Velo.
author: ahood
